FAQ Title: How else can we help you?
FAQ1 Question: How do I register on the platform?
FAQ1 Answer: You can register by clicking the 'Get Started' button, accessing the registration area on the site, and filling in your information if you don't already have a login.
FAQ2 Question: I forgot the email and password to access the platform.
FAQ2 Answer: Click on 'Forgot your password?' on the login page and follow the instructions to recover your access to the platform.
FAQ3 Answer: You can access the 'Contact' screen and fill out the form so that support can resolve your issue. If it takes more than 24 hours, you can also use other contact methods available on the contact screen.
FAQ4 Question: How do I change the platform's language?
FAQ4 Answer: In the top right corner, there is a button with a flag. Click it to see a list of languages to switch to.
FAQ5 Question: How do I post something on the platform?
FAQ5 Answer: On Sempre Niceia, you can post events, news, or projects. However, you need to be a member. If you are a member, just click the 'Projects' button at the top of the screen, then click the green '+' button in the bottom right corner, and select the type of post you want to make!
FAQ6 Question: How do I edit my personal information?
FAQ6 Answer: If you need to change your information, click the 'Profile' button at the top of the screen. When viewing your profile, you can click the 'Edit profile' button, modify all your information, click 'Save,' and your information will be successfully updated!
FAQ7 Question: How do I become a member of the Sempre Niceia platform?
FAQ7 Answer: The result will be sent by email and will also be available in your user area.

slide1_description: The Sempre Nicea platform disseminates and stores scientific research about the Council of Nicaea. Focusing on the 325 CE event and its Trinitarian Profession of Faith, the platform provides access to studies, recent bibliography, and scientific updates.
slide2_title: The Theological Impact of the Council
slide2_description: Understand how the definitions of the Council of Nicaea shaped Christianity and influenced the development of Trinitarian doctrines in historical Churches.
slide3_description: Discover how the Council of Nicaea influenced art, politics, and philosophy over the centuries, as well as its current ecumenical relevance.

Esta seção reúne as referências bibliogr: This section gathers the bibliographic references that underpin the research developed and presented on this site. Each cited source reflects a commitment to academic accuracy, scientific integrity, and the appreciation of knowledge produced by recognized authors and institutions.
Por Riccardo Burigana – Luiz Carlos Luz: By Riccardo Burigana – Luiz Carlos Luz Marques - Alex Talarico

Uma iniciativa dedicada à divulgação e p: An initiative dedicated to the dissemination and preservation of studies on the Council of Nicaea.
Entenda o Concílio que Mudou a História: Understand the Council that Changed History
Descubra por que o Concílio de Niceia, e: Discover why the Council of Nicaea, in 325 CE, was a watershed moment in the Christian faith. One event, a lasting transformation.
Explore estudos e bibliografias atuais s: Explore current studies and bibliographies on Nicaea. Rigorous, organized, and accessible content for researchers and enthusiasts.
Fique por dentro das últimas publicações: Stay informed about the latest publications and findings on the Council and its influence today. Theological research in motion.
Como surgiu o Sempre Nicea?: How did Sempre Nicea come about?
O Concílio de Nicéia (325) representa um: The Council of Nicaea (325) represents a fundamental milestone in the history of Christianity due to the topics discussed, the documents promulgated, the manner of its realization, its various receptions over the centuries, and its relevance to the life of the current Church, with special emphasis on ecumenical dialogue.
Por ocasião do 1700º aniversário de sua: On the occasion of its 1700th anniversary, the international historical-religious research project Sempre Nicaea was conceived. Present, ecumenical memories, and history of the Council of Nicaea (325-2025) for the fruitfulness and relevance of this Council and its reception from an ecumenical perspective.
Há mais para descobrir conforme você nav: There is more to discover as you navigate through our interactive experience.
O projeto é impulsionado por instituiçõe: The project is driven by leading institutions in the theological and academic fields, joining efforts to strengthen ecumenical dialogue and historical research. Among the main promoters are:
Pontifícia Faculdade Teológica do Sul da: Pontifical Theological Faculty of Southern Italy – St. Thomas Aquinas Section
Centro de Estudos para o Ecumenismo na I: Center for Ecumenism Studies in Italy
Organismos Ecumênicos, Instituições Acad: Ecumenical Organizations, Academic Institutions, and Scientific Associations that have granted sponsorship to the international historical-religious research project Semper Nicea. Present, ecumenical memories, and history of the Council of Nicaea (325-2025)
Associação Italiana dos Professores de H: Italian Association of Church History Professors
Sociedade para a Pesquisa da História do: Society for the Study of the History of Councils
Instituições académicas, centros de inve: Academic institutions, research centers, and scientific associations collaborating in the creation of the international historical-religious research project Semper Nicea. Present, ecumenical memories, and history of the Council of Nicaea (325-2025)
O projeto Veritas in Caritate é dedicado: The Veritas in Caritate project is dedicated to the pursuit of truth with love and charity. Inspired by academic and ethical principles, it promotes reflections and studies that combine intellectual rigor with a commitment to human values, offering a platform for deep and meaningful dialogues.
Por Gianluca Blancini, Riccardo Burigana: By Gianluca Blancini, Riccardo Burigana, Mauro Lucchesi, Luiz Carlos Luz Marques, Francesco Pesce, and Alex Talarico
Todas as Edições do Veritas In Caritate: All Editions of Veritas In Caritate

Estes são alunos dos 4º e 5º períodos do: These are students from the 4th and 5th semesters of the Internet Systems course at the Catholic University of Pernambuco. In partnership with Semper Nicea, they developed a web platform dedicated to storing and disseminating all the research and content of the initiative. The students, true prodigies, were responsible for all stages of the project, from interface design to the complete development of the system.
Programador Fullstack, Designer UI/UX, S: Fullstack Programmer, UI/UX Designer, Software Architecture
A Secretaria Científica do Projeto Nicei: The Scientific Secretariat of the Nicea Project coordinates research, manages publications, and organizes academic events about the Council of Nicaea. It is responsible for data storage, scientific dissemination, and administrative support, as well as promoting education and seeking research funding.
Quem é o responsável pelo grupo Sempre N: Who is responsible for the Sempre Nicea group?
O grupo Sempre Nicea é coordenado por um: The Sempre Nicea group is coordinated by an ecumenical team composed of representatives from partner institutions, with support from the Scientific Secretariat. For more details, see the "Development Team" section on the website.
Acesse a página de login, clique em \"Ca: Go to the login page, click "Register" to create an account with your email and password, or use "Forgot my password" to recover access. After registration, you can enter the user area.
O que são os membros do Sempre Nicea?: What are the members of Sempre Nicea?
Os membros são indivíduos e instituições: Members are individuals and institutions engaged in preserving the ecumenical memory of the Council of Nicaea. They include researchers, students, clergy, and enthusiasts who participate in events and access exclusive content.
Como posso fazer parte do Sempre Nicea?: How can I join Sempre Nicea?
Para se tornar parte, crie uma conta na: To join, create an account on the registration page and participate in planned activities such as events, courses, and forums. You can also subscribe to receive updates or contribute to projects.
Sim, qualquer pessoa interessada na hist: Yes, anyone interested in the history and legacy of the Council of Nicaea can create a free account to access content and participate in the Sempre Nicea community.
Como acesso conteúdos exclusivos, como o: How do I access exclusive content like Veritas in Caritate?
Após criar sua conta, faça login e acess: After creating your account, log in and access the user area. There you will find publications like Veritas in Caritate and historical archives in the files section.
Como posso participar dos eventos do Sem: How can I participate in Sempre Nicea events?
Consulte a seção \"Atividades Previstas\: Check the "Planned Activities" section on the website to see the event calendar. After creating your account, you can register for courses, lectures, and forums directly on the platform.
Realização de seminários com especialist: Holding seminars with experts in history and theology, addressing topics related to the Council of Nicaea.
Organização de uma conferência internaci: Organization of an international conference with the participation of academics and experts in Church history.
Criação de uma bibliografia especializad: Creation of a specialized bibliography on the Council of Nicaea, focusing on academic works and primary sources.
Divulgação de Eventos e Iniciativas do 1: Promotion of Events and Initiatives for the 1700th Anniversary of the Council
Coleta e publicação de informações sobre: Collection and publication of information about events and initiatives related to the 1700th anniversary of the Council of Nicaea.
Os projetos são organizados em 4 áreas t: The projects are organized into 4 thematic areas
História do Concílio de Nicéia: History of the Council of Nicaea
Niceia e a Igreja no Século XXI: Nicaea and the Church in the 21st Century
